title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (Node + browsers).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, tools, retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, multi-user, model manager, RAG).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and streaming.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module that injects Ollama client with decorators and async config.

title: ollama-go
summary: Unofficial idiomatic Go client for Ollama (generate, chat, embeddings).

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library and CLI for Ollama with streaming chat completions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models in pipelines for QA & RAG.

title: ollama-kit
summary: Swift package for iOS/macOS apps to chat with Ollama servers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Lightweight Alpine-based Docker image for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete using Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into channels or DMs.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Hugging Face Hub downloader that converts & quantizes models into Ollama format.
